in gnome

what folder are the program files in?  IE: So I can change a certain type of file association..

all I need toknow is what folder the program files are in...
What kind of files?
Oh, to change file association, right-click on a file, and click Properties, there is an "Open With" tab
yea, I know that..  I need to know what folder the actual program files are in so i can change it myself..
Why?
I don't understand what kind of file you are looking for
What is the actual problem you have?
all I need to know if what folder the program files are in...  that all...  nothing more..
Files are everywhere on Linux
Configuration files (which I suspect is what you are looking for) are in /etc
ok,  I need the XMMS program file..
What fooor? :) You will mess your system up if you move things like that around, it's not the correct way of doing things
yur no dam help at all..   :-/
In Terminal type: which xmms
It should tell you where to find it :)
